description: Sets the team that the objective is for. Allows having different objectives for each team.
*ðŸš© This documentation is for the IW3 version of this function credit to Raid Gaming and has yet to be reviewed/updated for IW4.*

params.name: objective number
description: The number of the objective to alter.

params.name: team
description: The team that the objective is for. Valid entries are "allies", "axis", or "none".
